segments.text: Hi Jim . Do you have a minute ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Some of us are going to start a soccer team . Would you like to join us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don ’ t know anything about it . Soccer isn ’ t as popular in my country as it is here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s all right . We ’ ll teach you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is it anything like American football ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not very much . It ’ s something like hockey , except that you use a big ball and no stick .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ ll come down and watch you play some day , and see what it ’ s like .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good idea . I think you ’ ll like it if you give it a chance .
segments.speaker: S1
